faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to your questions about InterFlow Chat
faq.question1: How long does it take to implement InterFlow Chat?
faq.answer1: Implementation is quick and can be completed right away. Our team provides full support throughout the process.
faq.question2: Do I need to install any applications?
faq.answer2: No, InterFlow Chat is 100% cloud-based. You access it through your browser, with no installations required.
faq.question3: How does the integration with WhatsApp and Instagram work?
faq.answer3: The integration is simple and official. For WhatsApp, we use Meta's official API but also unofficial methods. For Instagram and Facebook, we connect directly to your business account.
faq.answer4: Yes! We offer a 7-day free trial with all features available, no commitment and no credit card required.
faq.question5: Is there a limit on agents or messages?
faq.answer5: Each plan has its specifications. We have options from small businesses to large corporations with large-scale service.
faq.question6: Can I change plans at any time?
faq.answer6: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately and the value is adjusted proportionally.
faq.answer7: All plans include email support. More advanced plans also include chat and phone support with priority response times.
